Humidity: 74 %

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening. 40 percent chance of flurries near the Cariboo mountains overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 6:21 PM PST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow mixed with rain beginning in the afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 in the afternoon. High plus 3. Forecast issued 6:21 PM PST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening. Forecast issued 6:21 PM PST Tuesday 17 January 2023
